title: Bowl, ca. 1810
provenance: Delomosne & son, Ltd., London, 1961 P. Warren NY ANTIQUES Oct. 1981
description: Oval-shaped bowl with scalloped rim, on the sides a wide band of shallow diamonds filled with small diamonds or stars, a row of husks beneath; inverted baluster-shaped stem, high, spreading lobed foot with scalloped edge; molded star bottom side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. Glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-142.
